IMPACT_ITEMS.title: Mentorship
IMPACT_ITEMS.description: We believe knowledge is what makes us distinguished and so we're committed to offering quality training to our ladies

IMPACT_ITEMS.title: Community
IMPACT_ITEMS.description: We are a community of proactive sisters who come together to achieve a common goal of being self-confident, innovative, and self-aware. All these we encourage and achieve through our various community events.

IMPACT_ITEMS.title: Events
IMPACT_ITEMS.description: Through our events, we help create adequate awareness and enlightenment on trending topics in the web3 ecosystem.
